name: Jimmy's Adventure II: Christmas Boogaloo
description: It's a few days before Christmas and Sissy wants a tree to decorate. Her brother Jimmy braves the cold Sleepywood in search of the perfect specimen, only to be zapped away to a distant world by the mysterious, angry elf Hoggendauce! Join Jimmy and his giant, disco-dancing companion Ulgrid on this incredible adventure of frendship and Christian values. Save Christmas and the Kingdom of Guidigern!
